fact_check_explanation_title: Vaccinated Germans won’t have AIDS by the end of January 2022
fact_check_explanation_summary: An article by The Expose uses inaccurate figures and flawed calculations to incorrectly claim that Covid vaccines cause AIDS.

fact_check_explanation_title: A Guido Fawkes ‘fact check’ incorrectly claims the SNP is wrong
fact_check_explanation_summary: The SNP quoted Covid-19 figures from the ONS correctly.

fact_check_explanation_title: TikTok joke about masks in Zoom meetings is taken seriously on Facebook
fact_check_explanation_summary: This comes from a satirical account in the US. It isn’t true.

fact_check_explanation_title: Are lateral flow test results included in headline Covid-19 case figures?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Reported positive lateral flow tests are included in the UK’s overall Covid case figures for England and Northern Ireland, but are not currently being included in Scotland and Wales.

fact_check_explanation_title: A giant asteroid isn’t about to ‘crash into the Earth’s atmosphere’
fact_check_explanation_summary: The closest the asteroid in question will come to the Earth’s surface is 3.5 million miles away.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence masks limit oxygen for children
fact_check_explanation_summary: A post on Instagram claims masks ‘do nothing’ but limit oxygen flow and increase risk of bacteria and illness.
While the Prime Minister claimed income inequality was falling, the latest analysis suggests it may be rising again after income support schemes were removed.

fact_check_explanation_title: Egyptian man did not give partner jewellery  made from his teeth
fact_check_explanation_summary: Incorrect claims a man gave his partner jewellery made from his teeth stemmed from an online joke.

fact_check_explanation_title: Telegraph wrong to claim removing PCR requirement will shorten self-isolation period
fact_check_explanation_summary: For people without symptoms, self-isolation begins from the date of the first test which returned a positive result, whether that was a lateral flow or PCR test.

fact_check_explanation_title: Did Chris Whitty say you should keep testing after day 10 of isolation?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The DHSC and the Chief Medical Officer confirmed that the comments were specifically in reference to day six and seven tests and that government advice not to routinely test after …

fact_check_explanation_title: The Warm Home Discount is £140 for the entire winter, not a week
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Prime Minister described the discount incorrectly during PMQs.

fact_check_explanation_title: Unvaccinated people are among those dying of Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: Age adjusted mortality rates are higher for those who haven’t been vaccinated.
